name: distribution-not-selected
description: Choose a distribution by running 'npm run apply:owl'.
changes: changes to this file can be commited with the --no-verify option

scripts.postinstall: npm run apply:owl && echo && echo "Repo configured for standard OWL distribution." && echo
scripts.start: echo && echo "Choose a distribution by running 'npm run apply:owl'." && echo
scripts.apply:owl: npm i fs-extra@0.30 && cd app-template && node apply.js owl && cd .. && npm i
